brandIdentity.designSummary: This brand design features a modern, minimalistic aesthetic with a strong emphasis on grid-based structure and high contrast. The primary colors are black and white, providing a clean and professional backdrop, while vibrant orange and soft lavender gradients serve as accent colors to highlight key interactive elements and create visual interest. Typography is monospaced and typewriter-inspired, reinforcing a technical and coding-related theme. The layout is modular and asymmetrical, using clear columns and rows with visible grid lines to evoke a sense of precision and order. UI components such as buttons are sharp-edged and functional, primarily using the 'secondary' orange color for calls to action. The overall visual personality is futuristic, energetic, and tech-savvy, suitable for technology conferences or digital product showcases.
brandIdentity.toneOfVoice: Professional, innovative, precise, and energetic with a tech-savvy and modern personality.

palette.paletteUsageGuide: Use the 'primary' black color predominantly for backgrounds and large text blocks to create strong contrast with the 'primaryForeground' white text. The 'secondary' orange color is reserved for call-to-action buttons, highlights, and interactive elements, paired with 'secondaryForeground' black text for readability. The 'lavenderGradientStart' and 'lavenderGradientEnd' colors form a smooth gradient used in large background blocks and overlays to add a modern, digital feel without overwhelming the design. The 'gridLine' color is used subtly for background grid lines to reinforce the structured, technical aesthetic. These colors should be combined thoughtfully to maintain accessibility and visual hierarchy, ensuring that text and interactive elements stand out clearly against their backgrounds.
palette.paletteAccessibilityNotes: The 'primaryForeground' white text on 'primary' black background meets WCAG AAA contrast standards for all text sizes. The 'secondaryForeground' black text on 'secondary' orange background meets WCAG AA standards for normal text and AAA for large text. The lavender gradient colors provide sufficient contrast when used with black text for headings and body copy. The 'gridLine' color is light and used only for non-interactive background elements, ensuring no accessibility issues.

headings.headingsUsageGuide: Use the 'azeret-mono' font for all headings to maintain a consistent, technical aesthetic. Headings should be uppercase or sentence case with generous letter spacing to enhance readability and emphasize the futuristic tone. Pair headings with paragraph text in the same font family but smaller size to maintain harmony. Use the 'primary' and 'secondary' colors for headings depending on background context to ensure strong contrast and accessibility.
headings.headingsAccessibilityNotes: Headings in 'azeret-mono' with 'primaryForeground' on 'primary' or 'secondaryForeground' on 'secondary' backgrounds meet WCAG AAA contrast standards, ensuring clear readability.

paragraphs.paragraphsUsageGuide: Use the same 'azeret-mono' font for paragraphs to maintain a cohesive and minimalistic style. Body text should be smaller with normal letter spacing and line height optimized for readability. Use 'primary' or 'secondary' colors for text depending on background to maintain contrast. Avoid overly long lines by using grid-based layout and spacing. This font pairing supports the technical and modern brand tone.
paragraphs.paragraphsAccessibilityNotes: Paragraph text in 'azeret-mono' with 'primaryForeground' on 'primary' or 'secondaryForeground' on 'secondary' backgrounds meets WCAG AA standards for normal text and AAA for large text.

welcomeSectionTypography.implementation: The welcome or hero section uses large, bold headings anchored in the top third of the viewport, creating immediate visual impact. The text is left-aligned with generous spacing, supported by a modular grid layout. Accent colors from the palette highlight key phrases or calls to action, while the background uses gradient blocks to add depth without distracting from the typography.

components.containers: Containers use solid backgrounds in 'background' white or gradient blocks from 'lavenderGradientStart' to 'lavenderGradientEnd'. They maintain consistent padding and margin to preserve the grid structure. Borders or outlines use the 'gridLine' color subtly to define sections without clutter.
components.images: Images are black and white portraits with clean edges, integrated into the grid with consistent sizing. They maintain a professional and minimalistic style, complementing the monospaced typography and overall tech theme.
components.buttons: Buttons are rectangular with sharp edges, primarily filled with the 'secondary' orange color and text in 'secondaryForeground' black. Secondary buttons may use transparent backgrounds with orange borders and black text. Buttons have consistent padding and are sized to be easily clickable, emphasizing calls to action.

graphicElements.icons: Icons, if used, would be minimalistic, line-based, and monochromatic, primarily using 'primaryForeground' white or 'secondary' orange for emphasis. They align with the monospaced, technical aesthetic.
graphicElements.illustrations: No illustrations are present; the design relies on geometric shapes and gradients for visual interest.
graphicElements.stickers: No stickers or badges are used, maintaining a clean and professional look.

brandIdentity.designSummary: This brand design features a minimalist, modern, and tech-focused aesthetic characterized by a monochromatic palette of black, white, and light gray, accented with a vibrant neon green. The layout employs a grid-based but asymmetrical structure with generous whitespace, creating a spacious and clean interface. Typography is dominated by bold, geometric monospace or monospaced-inspired fonts that evoke a technical, industrial feel, reinforcing the brand's precision and innovation. Interactive elements and highlights use the neon green color to draw attention subtly yet effectively. The overall visual personality is utilitarian, futuristic, and professional, suitable for technology or audio-related industries.
brandIdentity.toneOfVoice: The brand’s personality is confident, precise, and innovative with a professional and modern tone. It communicates clarity and technical expertise while maintaining an approachable and energetic edge through its neon accent.

palette.paletteUsageGuide: Use the 'primary' color predominantly for text and key UI elements on light backgrounds, ensuring high contrast with 'secondary' backgrounds. The 'secondary' color serves as the main background in light mode, with 'secondaryForeground' used for text on these backgrounds. For dark mode, use 'darkBackground' as the base background color with 'primaryForeground' for text to maintain readability. The 'neonAccent' color is reserved for interactive elements, highlights, and calls to action, providing energetic emphasis without overwhelming the minimalist aesthetic. Do not use the the 'neonAccent' color as text or icons paired the background or secondary '#F5F5F5' or with  bright colors. Combine 'neonAccent' with 'primary' to maintain clarity and focus. This palette supports accessibility by maintaining strong contrast ratios between text and backgrounds in both light and dark modes.
palette.paletteAccessibilityNotes: The 'primary' color (#000000) on 'secondary' (#F5F5F5) background achieves excellent WCAG AA contrast for body text and UI elements. The 'primaryForeground' (#FFFFFF) on 'darkBackground' (#121212) also meets WCAG AA standards for dark mode readability. The 'neonAccent' (#7FFF00) provides sufficient contrast against 'primary' for interactive elements, ensuring visibility and accessibility. Care should be taken to use 'neonAccent' on sufficiently contrasting backgrounds to maintain legibility.

headings.headingsUsageGuide: Use the heading font in bold weights for large, impactful titles and hero text to establish a strong visual hierarchy. Pair with the paragraph font to maintain a cohesive monospace aesthetic. Maintain ample spacing around headings to enhance readability and emphasize the technical, industrial tone. Use 'neonAccent' sparingly in headings for emphasis or interactive cues, ensuring contrast with background colors.
headings.headingsAccessibilityNotes: Headings in 'Open Sans' with 'primary' or 'primaryForeground' colors on contrasting backgrounds meet WCAG AA standards for size and contrast, ensuring clear readability.

paragraphs.paragraphsUsageGuide: Use the paragraph font in regular or medium weights for body text and navigation links. Maintain consistent letter spacing and line height to enhance legibility. Pair with the heading font to create a unified monospace typographic system. Use 'primary' or 'primaryForeground' colors for text depending on background, and reserve 'neonAccent' for links or interactive text elements to maintain visual interest and accessibility.
paragraphs.paragraphsAccessibilityNotes: Paragraph text in 'azeret-mono' with 'primary' or 'primaryForeground' colors on contrasting backgrounds meets WCAG AA contrast requirements for body text, ensuring accessibility.

welcomeSectionTypography.implementation: The welcome section uses a centered typographic placement with oversized, bold monospace headings dominating the visual space. This is paired with smaller, monospaced body text aligned centrally or left-aligned beneath the heading. The layout balances large typography with generous whitespace, creating a strong focal point that immediately communicates the brand’s technical and modern identity. Neon green accent brackets or highlights may be used around key words or interactive elements to draw attention within this centered composition.

components.containers: Containers use solid backgrounds in either 'secondary' or 'darkBackground' colors with minimal borders or shadows, maintaining a clean and unobtrusive frame for content. Padding is consistent to ensure content clarity and separation.
components.images: Images are presented with no heavy framing or decoration, integrated seamlessly into the grid layout. They maintain a clean, product-focused style with ample whitespace around them to emphasize clarity and focus.
components.buttons: Buttons are minimal with solid 'neonAccent' backgrounds and white text in dark mode or black text in light mode. Secondary buttons use outlined styles with 'neonAccent' borders and text. Hover states invert colors or increase brightness for clear interactivity cues.

graphicElements.icons: Icons are minimal line drawings in 'primary' or 'primaryForeground' colors, consistent with the monospace and technical aesthetic. They are used sparingly to support navigation and UI clarity.
graphicElements.illustrations: No decorative illustrations are used; the design relies on product photography and typography for visual interest.
graphicElements.stickers: No sticker or badge elements are present, maintaining the minimalist and clean design ethos.

brandIdentity.designSummary: This brand design features a bold, modern aesthetic centered around a deep dark background that serves as a dramatic canvas for vibrant neon gradient colors. The palette includes dynamic blends of pink, yellow, green, and cyan, used extensively in UI elements, borders, and text fills to evoke energy and motion reminiscent of nighttime city lights. Typography is dominated by heavy, italicized sans-serif fonts that convey speed, urgency, and excitement, balanced by clean italic body text for readability. The layout employs a modular grid with asymmetrical overlays and generous negative space, allowing neon elements to stand out vividly. Interactive components like buttons and navigation bars use solid neon green and white for high contrast and clarity. Graphic elements such as gradient ribbons with repeated text create a sense of movement and engagement, reinforcing the futuristic and energetic brand personality. Overall, the design is sleek, youthful, and dynamic, suitable for event-driven or tech-forward brands seeking to communicate vibrancy and modernity.
brandIdentity.toneOfVoice: Energetic, modern, dynamic, youthful, and futuristic with a sense of urgency and excitement.

palette.paletteUsageGuide: Use the 'background' color as the primary canvas to create a high-contrast environment that allows neon colors to pop. The 'primary' neon green is ideal for key interactive elements such as buttons and highlights, paired with 'primaryForeground' black for text to ensure readability. The 'secondary' white color is used for text and icons on dark backgrounds, with 'secondaryForeground' neon green for emphasis and hover states. Gradient colors like 'gradientPink', 'gradientYellow', and 'gradientCyan' should be applied in borders, text fills, and decorative ribbons to convey motion and vibrancy. Buttons should use 'buttonBackground' for their fill with 'buttonForeground' for text to maintain clarity and contrast. Combining these colors thoughtfully ensures a dynamic, accessible, and visually engaging interface that aligns with the energetic and futuristic brand identity.
palette.paletteAccessibilityNotes: The 'primaryForeground' black text on 'primary' neon green backgrounds meets WCAG AA standards for contrast, ensuring readability. White ('secondary') text on the 'background' black provides excellent contrast and accessibility. Gradient colors should be used decoratively and sparingly for text to avoid contrast issues; solid colors are preferred for essential text. Buttons with 'buttonBackground' and 'buttonForeground' maintain sufficient contrast for interactive elements. Overall, the palette supports accessibility while maintaining the vibrant neon aesthetic.

headings.headingsUsageGuide: Use the heading font in bold italic styles to emphasize key messages and create a sense of motion and urgency. Headings should be large and spaced generously to stand out against the dark background and neon colors. Pair headings with italic body fonts for contrast and readability. Avoid using gradients directly on headings for accessibility; instead, use solid neon colors or white for clarity.
headings.headingsAccessibilityNotes: Headings in solid neon colors or white on the dark background meet WCAG AA contrast requirements, ensuring legibility for all users.

paragraphs.paragraphsUsageGuide: Use the paragraph font in italic style to maintain the dynamic and modern tone while ensuring readability. Body text should be smaller than headings with sufficient line height and letter spacing. Use solid white or neon green for text color to maintain contrast against the dark background. Avoid using gradient fills for body text to preserve accessibility.
paragraphs.paragraphsAccessibilityNotes: Body text in white or neon green on the dark background meets WCAG AA contrast standards, supporting readability.

welcomeSectionTypography.implementation: The welcome section uses a large, bold, italic heading centered horizontally and vertically on the page, with a neon gradient fill that transitions smoothly across the text. Below the heading, a smaller italic subtitle in solid white provides supporting information. The text is placed against the dark background to maximize contrast and visual impact. This placement creates a strong focal point that immediately draws the user's attention and sets the energetic tone for the site.

components.containers: Containers have rounded corners with neon gradient borders that create a glowing effect against the dark background. They maintain consistent padding and spacing to separate content clearly while reinforcing the energetic neon theme.
components.images: Images are framed with multi-colored neon gradient borders and rounded corners, integrating them seamlessly into the vibrant design. The images themselves are vibrant and dynamic, complementing the overall energetic aesthetic.
components.buttons: Buttons are rounded with solid neon green backgrounds and black text for primary actions, or white backgrounds with neon green text for secondary actions. They have subtle shadows or glows to enhance their prominence and interactivity.

graphicElements.icons: Icons are simple, white, and minimalistic, designed to stand out clearly against the dark background without competing with the neon gradients.
graphicElements.illustrations: No specific illustrations are present; the design relies on photographic content enhanced by neon gradient overlays and borders.
graphicElements.stickers: No stickers or badges are used; emphasis is placed on clean, bold typography and neon gradient graphic elements.

brandIdentity.designSummary: The design features a modern dark mode aesthetic with a solid black background that creates a sleek and immersive environment. Vibrant neon green and bright blue accent colors energize the interface, highlighting interactive elements and branding. Typography is geometric, clean, and sans-serif, with large, bold headings that mix white and neon green to emphasize key messages. The layout is spacious and balanced, using a centered column grid with generous negative space and rounded corners on containers and buttons to soften the high-tech feel. The footer employs a modular grid with distinct colored blocks, maintaining visual consistency and clarity. Overall, the design conveys a cutting-edge, digital culture vibe suitable for a gaming or tech conference, combining high contrast, minimalism, and vibrant accents for a friendly yet professional look.
brandIdentity.toneOfVoice: Futuristic, innovative, approachable, and tech-savvy with a casual yet professional personality.

palette.paletteUsageGuide: The color system is anchored by a deep 'background' which should cover the majority of the viewport to maintain the dark mode aesthetic. Use the 'primary' neon mint color sparingly for high-impact elements like primary buttons, key data highlights, or active states; always pair it with 'primaryForeground' (black) for text to ensure maximum legibility. The 'secondary' blue serves as a strong background for feature sections or secondary calls-to-action, paired with 'secondaryForeground' (white). The 'brandAccent' peach is utilized for variety in card backgrounds or illustrative elements, best paired with black text. Use the 'surfaceDark' for cards or footers to create subtle depth against the main 'background'. Main content text should always be in 'foreground' (white) to contrast against the black surroundings
palette.paletteAccessibilityNotes: The palette is designed for high contrast. The combination of 'background' and 'foreground' yields a perfect 21:1 ratio (AAA). The 'primary' color is sufficiently bright to pass AAA standards when used against the 'background', and it maintains excellent contrast with 'primaryForeground' text. The 'secondary' color has been calibrated to meet WCAG AA standards (~4.5:1) when paired with 'secondaryForeground' (white). The 'brandAccent' peach provides high contrast against black text, making it safe for content containers.

headings.headingsUsageGuide: Use the heading font in large sizes with bold weight to create impactful titles and section headers. Mix white and 'accentNeonGreen' colors to highlight key words or phrases, enhancing visual hierarchy. Pair headings with paragraph fonts by maintaining clear spacing and contrast. Ensure headings remain legible on dark backgrounds by using 'primaryForeground' or 'accentNeonGreen' colors. Avoid overly condensed or decorative styles to preserve clarity.
headings.headingsAccessibilityNotes: Headings in 'primaryForeground' white or 'accentNeonGreen' on 'primary' black background meet WCAG AAA contrast standards, ensuring excellent readability for all users.

paragraphs.paragraphsUsageGuide: Use the paragraph font in regular weight and moderate sizes for body text, descriptions, and navigation links. Maintain high contrast by using 'primaryForeground' white on 'primary' black or 'secondary' blue backgrounds. Ensure sufficient line height and letter spacing for comfortable reading. Pair paragraphs with bold headings to create clear content hierarchy. Avoid using accent colors for large blocks of text to maintain readability.
paragraphs.paragraphsAccessibilityNotes: Paragraph text in 'primaryForeground' white on 'primary' black or 'secondary' blue backgrounds meets WCAG AA or higher contrast standards, supporting accessibility.

welcomeSectionTypography.implementation: The welcome section uses a large, bold heading centered horizontally and vertically within the viewport. The heading text is split with a mix of 'primaryForeground' white and 'accentNeonGreen' colors to emphasize key words. Supporting text is placed below the heading in smaller white font, maintaining strong contrast. Interactive badges and date tags are positioned near the heading with rounded shapes and neon green backgrounds, reinforcing the futuristic theme. The overall typographic placement creates a strong focal point that immediately communicates the event's identity.

components.containers: Containers have rounded corners with solid backgrounds in black, neon green, blue, or peach depending on context. They maintain consistent padding and spacing, creating modular blocks that organize content clearly. The use of bright accent backgrounds for interactive or navigational containers draws user attention effectively.
components.images: Images are minimal or abstract, often replaced by graphic elements or logos. When present, images are framed within rounded containers or circular shapes to maintain design consistency.
components.buttons: Buttons are rounded with solid backgrounds in 'accentNeonGreen' or outlined in white. Text on buttons is white or black depending on background for maximum contrast. Buttons have clear hover states and are sized for easy interaction.

graphicElements.icons: Icons are simple, modern, and use the 'accentNeonGreen' color to stand out against dark backgrounds. They have rounded shapes consistent with the overall design language and are used sparingly to support navigation and calls to action.
graphicElements.illustrations: No prominent illustrations are used; the design relies on abstract shapes and logos to convey brand identity.
graphicElements.stickers: Badges and stickers use rounded pill shapes with 'accentNeonGreen' backgrounds and black text, providing clear, friendly labels for event types and dates.

brandBook.toneOfVoice: Professional, innovative, precise, and energetic with a tech-savvy and modern personality.

components.images: Images are black and white portraits with clean edges, integrated into the grid with consistent sizing. They maintain a professional and minimalistic style, complementing the monospaced typography and overall tech theme.
components.buttons: Buttons are rectangular with sharp edges, primarily filled with the 'secondary' orange color and text in 'secondaryForeground' black. Secondary buttons may use transparent backgrounds with orange borders and black text. Buttons have consistent padding and are sized to be easily clickable, emphasizing calls to action.
components.containers: Containers use solid backgrounds in 'background' white or gradient blocks from 'lavenderGradientStart' to 'lavenderGradientEnd'. They maintain consistent padding and margin to preserve the grid structure. Borders or outlines use the 'gridLine' color subtly to define sections without clutter.

Pair headings with paragraph text in the same font family but smaller size to maintain harmony. Use the 'primary' and 'secondary' colors for headings depending on background context to ensure strong contrast and accessibility.
headings.headingsAccessibilityNotes: Headings in 'azeret-mono' with 'primaryForeground' on 'primary' or 'secondaryForeground' on 'secondary' backgrounds meet WCAG AAA contrast standards, ensuring clear readability.

paragraphs.paragraphsUsageGuide: Use the same 'azeret-mono' font for paragraphs to maintain a cohesive and minimalistic style. Body text should be smaller with normal letter spacing and line height optimized for readability. Use 'primary' or 'secondary' colors for text depending on background to maintain contrast. Avoid overly long lines by using grid-based layout and spacing. This font pairing supports the technical and modern brand tone.
paragraphs.paragraphsAccessibilityNotes: Paragraph text in 'azeret-mono' with 'primaryForeground' on 'primary' or 'secondaryForeground' on 'secondary' backgrounds meets WCAG AA standards for normal text and AAA for large text.

The text is left-aligned with generous spacing, supported by a modular grid layout. Accent colors from the palette highlight key phrases or calls to action, while the background uses gradient blocks to add depth without distracting from the typography.

graphicElements.icons: Icons, if used, would be minimalistic, line-based, and monochromatic, primarily using 'primaryForeground' white or 'secondary' orange for emphasis. They align with the monospaced, technical aesthetic.
graphicElements.stickers: No stickers or badges are used, maintaining a clean and professional look.
graphicElements.illustrations: No illustrations are present; the design relies on geometric shapes and gradients for visual interest.

brandBook.designSummary: This brand design features a modern, minimalistic aesthetic with a strong emphasis on grid-based structure and high contrast. The primary colors are black and white, providing a clean and professional backdrop, while vibrant orange and soft lavender gradients serve as accent colors to highlight key interactive elements and create visual interest. Typography is monospaced and typewriter-inspired, reinforcing a technical and coding-related theme. The layout is modular and asymmetrical, using clear columns and rows with visible grid lines to evoke a sense of precision and order. UI components such as buttons are sharp-edged and functional, primarily using the 'secondary' orange color for calls to action. The overall visual personality is futuristic, energetic, and tech-savvy, suitable for technology conferences or digital product showcases.

palette.paletteUsageGuide: Use the 'primary' black color predominantly for backgrounds and large text blocks to create strong contrast with the 'primaryForeground' white text. The 'secondary' orange color is reserved for call-to-action buttons, highlights, and interactive elements, paired with 'secondaryForeground' black text for readability. The 'lavenderGradientStart' and 'lavenderGradientEnd' colors form a smooth gradient used in large background blocks and overlays to add a modern, digital feel without overwhelming the design. The 'gridLine' color is used subtly for background grid lines to reinforce the structured, technical aesthetic. The 'secondaryForeground' black text on 'secondary' orange background meets WCAG AA standards for normal text and AAA for large text. initialPrompt: IdeaScope - AI-Powered Startup Idea Evaluator. The site will help users evaluate startup ideas using AI, scoring them on novelty, market potential, technical difficulty, user fit, and more. It will integrate with APIs for research papers, startup databases, and news sentiment, and provide a modern, clean interface. Design agent: Knox
